    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbstractDAO<T>
    Abstract generic DAO class that provides basic CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) for any type of entity.
    Bill
    Represents a Bill with an id, associated order id, and details.
    BillBLL
    Business Logic Layer for Bill operations.
    BillDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) class for handling Bill records in the Log table.
    Client
    Represents a client with an id, name, address, and email.
    ClientBLL
    Business Logic Layer for Client operations.
    ClientController
    Controller class for Client UI.
    ClientDAO
     
    ConnectionFactory
    Singleton factory class to manage database connections.
    HelloApplication
     
    LogController
    Controller class for displaying and refreshing the Bill log table in the UI.
    MainController
    Controller for the main application window.
    OrderController
    Controller for managing Orders UI.
    Orders
    Represents an order made by a client for a specific product with a quantity.
    OrdersBLL
    Business Logic Layer for Orders management.
    OrdersDAO
     
    Product
    Represents a product with an ID, name, stock quantity, and price.
    ProductBLL
    Business Logic Layer for Product operations.
    ProductController
    Controller for managing products in the UI.
    ProductDAO
     
    TableViewBuilder
    Utility class to build and populate JavaFX TableView dynamically based on the fields of a given model class.
